status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
In my private fork of ti.map I have realized a new overlay. With this the user can add several new overlays:

1) tile overlays from any providers (all of this: https://leaflet-extras.github.io/leaflet-providers/preview/)
2) wms provider (by boundingbox)
3) svg tile provider
4) heatmaps

How can I become contributer and make PR?
fields.summary: iOS: Add support for TileOverlay for Ti.Map
